title: Phoebe Waller-Bridge's net worth upon her big Emmy wins
text:
The 2019 Emmy Awards happened last night and as with most award shows, there were surprises, snubs and a whole lot of emotion.

Since the shift to consumers craving and watching shows on subscriber-based platforms, like Netflix and Hulu, the Emmy's themselves have shifted.

Last night was a clear example of this, as breakout star from Amazon Prime's 'Fleabag', Phoebe Waller-Bridge took home the award for Outstanding Lead Actress — Comedy Series and 'Fleabag' won for Outstanding Comedy Series.

But what most don't know is that Waller-Bridge has been around in the industry for quite some time, and she's got the credentials and capital to prove it.

The English actress starred as Chloe Astill in the British television series 'The Cafe' from 2011 to 2013, followed by a role as Abby Thompson on 'Broadchurch' in 2015.

Waller-Bridge then went on to star as Lulu in 'Crashing' before beginning her on-screen role in 'Fleabag' in 2016.

But Waller-Bridge's projects go beyond acting. She created and wrote for 'Fleabag' as well at the TV series 'Crashing' and served as a writer for both 'Drifters' and the Hulu smash hit 'Killing Eve'.

Waller-Bridge also served as Executive Producer for 'Fleabag', 'Crashing' and Killing Eve.

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Phoebe Waller-Brdge is worth an estimated $3 million.
description: Waller-Bridge has been around in the industry for quite some time, and she's got the credentials and capital to prove it.
